unnormalised: Breaking News: Diwali prep starting ridiculously early this year!
normalised: Breaking News: Diwali preparation starting ridiculously early this year!

unnormalised: Sources confirm that planning for Diwali, which is on 1/11/2024 btw (mark your calendars!), has already begun. Apparently, Mrs. Sharma from Sector 17 started cleaning on 25/07/2024! That's like, 3 months early! We suspect she's aiming for a world record or something.
normalised: Sources confirm that planning for Diwali, which is on first november two thousand and twenty four by the way (mark your calendars!), has already begun. Apparently, Missus Sharma from Sector seventeen started cleaning on twenty fifth july two thousand and twenty four! That's like, three months early! We suspect she's aiming for a world record or something.

unnormalised: Rumours are swirling that her rangoli design already has a blueprint. Experts predict it will be visible from space. Meanwhile, the local sweet shop is preemptively increasing its mithai stock by, like, 500%. Good luck getting a decent Gulab Jamun after 15/10/2024, folks!
normalised: Rumours are swirling that her rangoli design already has a blueprint. Experts predict it will be visible from space. Meanwhile, the local sweet shop is preemptively increasing its mithai stock by, like, five hundred percent. Good luck getting a decent Gulab Jamun after fifteenth october two thousand and twenty four, folks!

unnormalised: And let's not forget the firecracker situation. Little Rohan was spotted comparing potential crackers' decibel levels on 01/08/2024. He seems to be aiming for a personal best for most explosions before 9:00 PM on Diwali night. May his neighbours have earplugs ready. Seriously, it's gonna be loud.
normalised: And let's not forget the firecracker situation. Little Rohan was spotted comparing potential crackers' decibel levels on first august two thousand and twenty four. He seems to be aiming for a personal best for most explosions before nine P-M on Diwali night. May his neighbours have earplugs ready. Seriously, it's going to be loud.

unnormalised: So, yeah, brace yourselves. Diwali is coming, and it's coming early this time. We'll keep you updated on any further advancements in the Diwali prep games as they unfold. Stay tuned and maybe start stocking up on mithai before 10/10/2024… just saying!
normalised: So, yeah, brace yourselves. Diwali is coming, and it's coming early this time. We'll keep you updated on any further advancements in the Diwali preparation games as they unfold. Stay tuned and maybe start stocking up on mithai before tenth october two thousand and twenty four… just saying!
